main.name: Vincent Falcone
main.occupation: QA Automation Expert / Software Developer in Test
main.description: I am always looking for ways to grow and broaden my horizons around all things testing related.
main.bio: I have been in Quality Assurance / Test Automation for over 15 years. I have experience managing software development teams, leading quality assurance teams, developing test automation frameworks, and defining testing best practices.
